thread.title: The beards are back as an accessory at Rugby World Cup

title: The beards are back as an accessory at Rugby World Cup
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
It's possible that the beards have been bigger, bushier and more commonly worn at the Rugby World Cup in 2015 than they were four years ago,...
